Hi Hagop ,

 

I know that you’re traveling, however please find below FYI .

 

Talking about being proactive ! : P

 

Best regards, 

Kev

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F9EitCyJKgfrl9oncZfgHx9Oja%3Fdomain%3Dweb.cvent.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C64658a42fe51447ce59008dd0d57b403%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681392547514124%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=cjW1vH5JlDg%2B0RbpgDVs1yD20rhgk4I2VhRp8%2Fc%2FjpY%3D&reserved=0> 

 


We are delighted to invite you to join us for an exclusive event designed specifically for business leaders like you. As we navigate an evolving risk landscape, Marsh is here to support your business in building resilience, managing uncertainty and ultimately thriving in today’s market.

This event will bring together experts and industry leaders to discuss strategies to protect against emerging risks, foster growth and strengthen your organization’s ability to adapt to global changes. We’ll be exploring critical topics, including climate impact, geopolitical instability and workforce growth in the UAE, all with the aim of empowering your business for the future.

This will also be our last event of 2024! Don’t miss out.

This event will bring together experts and industry leaders to discuss strategies to protect against emerging risks, foster growth and strengthen your organization’s ability to adapt to global changes. We’ll be exploring critical topics, including climate impact, geopolitical instability and workforce growth in the UAE, all with the aim of empowering your business for the future.

This will also be our last event of 2024! Don’t miss out.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Date: Wednesday, December 11, 2024

Time: 02:00 to 06:30 PM (GST) with drinks and nibbles to follow

Location: Hilton The Palm, Dubai, UAE 

	
 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don’t miss this opportunity to gain invaluable insights from industry leaders and network with professionals managing the same challenges.  

 

Register Now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F9EitCyJKgfrl9oncZfgHx9Oja%3Fdomain%3Dweb.cvent.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C64658a42fe51447ce59008dd0d57b403%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681392547539649%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=LyPoM1vtZy4qQZ5f0Y%2FiQZnmOGUc4fVJTNI6XcANGro%3D&reserved=0>
